|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfrgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wi(wbr(nat1, clt, cfv(chash, c2)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(cfv(cvtxdg, c0), c1))))

comment: Any vertex in a friendship graph (with more than one vertex - then, actually, the graph must have at least three vertices, because otherwise, it would not be a friendship graph) has at least degree 2, see remark 3 in [MertziosUnger] p. 153 (after Proposition 1): "It follows that deg(v) >= 2 for every node v of a friendship graph". (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 5-Apr-2021.)
